name: Intelectas
overview:
Intelectas provides sales performance management and revenue/price optimization software solutions for enterprise level companies.

Performance Manager helps align corporate strategy with incentive compensation management to encourage employees to execute against corporate goals instead of focusing on personal gains. It also automates much of the administrative tasks associated with compensation plans and provides up-to-date performance metrics that range from an individual level to a corporate view.

Prive/Revenue Optimizer analyzes internal, external and historical data to help you make pricing decisions that will maximize your profit. You can view and analyze current performance, simulate changes before executing them in the market, and track trends.

The ultimate purpose of any solution offered by Intelectas is to provide its users with more profits and better information.
